messages.subject: Help with ds--sex
messages.msgSnippet: First, I would have to say that I think you and your child should see someone professionally as soon as possible. A therapist could really bring some insight
messages.messageBody:
"First, I would have to say that I think you and your child should see
someone professionally as soon as possible. A therapist could really
bring some insight to what the root of the problem is."

I totally and completely 100% disagree with this.
I don't think every time there is an intense emotional issue in our
family, we need to go running to some "expert" as though it's a
terrible thing. Her child is dealing with some intense emotions. If he
didn't figure out how to cope after many weeks of this, then yeah, I
might want some help. He's a 10y.o. that just had his view of his
parents tweaked a bit too much for his comfort level.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
